subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ken Takahashi, a longtime pitcher in Japan, who was called up briefly by the Mets in May, said he had learned a lot from Nelson Figueroa in their time in Class AAA.
snippet: Ken Takahashi, a longtime pitcher in Japan, who was called up briefly by the Mets in May, said he had learned a lot from Nelson Figueroa in their time in Class AAA.
